Into Monads

> module Monads where

Division - Nothing example

A simple evaluator

> data Expr = Val Int | Div Expr Expr
> 
> eval1 :: Expr -> Int
> eval1 (Val n)     = n
> eval1 (Div e1 e2) = eval1 e1 `div` eval1 e2
> eval1 (Div (Val 5) (Val 0))
*** Exception: divide by zero
